titles: Laura The toyes of a traueller. Or The feast of fancie. Diuided into three parts. By R.T. Gentleman.
author: Tofte, Robert, 1561-1620.
notes: "While 'A frends iust excuse' on E7r asserts over 30 poems are not Tofte's, the statement is prob. false"--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
